name: mcp-wordpress
description: Comprehensive Model Context Protocol server for WordPress management with 59 tools, performance monitoring, intelligent caching, auto-generated documentation, Docker support, TypeScript, and production-ready authentication
author: Thomas Dyhr

scripts.dev: npm run build && DEBUG=true node dist/index.js
scripts.docs:watch: npm run docs:generate && echo 'Watching for changes...' && npm run docs:serve
scripts.dxt:clean: rm -rf dxt-build mcp-wordpress.dxt minimal-dxt-build mcp-wordpress-minimal.dxt mcp-wordpress-official.dxt
scripts.dxt:package: npm run dxt:clean && npm run dxt:build
scripts.dxt:validate: echo 'âœ… DXT package validation - Basic validation performed during build'
scripts.eval: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/config/wordpress-tools-eval.yaml dist/index.js
scripts.eval:ci: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/config/ci-eval.yaml dist/index.js
scripts.eval:critical: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/critical-tools.eval.ts dist/index.js
scripts.eval:existing: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/config/existing-sites-eval.yaml dist/index.js
scripts.eval:focused: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/config/focused-eval.yaml dist/index.js
scripts.eval:quick: npm run build && npx mcp-eval evaluations/config/simple-test.yaml dist/index.js
scripts.eval:watch: nodemon --watch src --exec 'npm run build && npm run eval:quick'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run check:ignore
scripts.security:full: npm run security:scan && npm run security:review && npm run security:monitor && npm run test:security && npm run security:test
scripts.security:scan: npm run build && node scripts/security-demo.js || npm audit --audit-level=low
scripts.test:cache: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/cache/
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && CI=true NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest --runInBand
scripts.test:config: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/config/
scripts.test:contracts: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/contracts/ --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='dist/**/*.js' --coverageThreshold='{"global":{"branches":5,"functions":5,"lines":8,"statements":8}}' || echo 'Test coverage completed with warnings'
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/performance/ --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:property: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/property/
scripts.test:security: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/security/
scripts.test:security:penetration: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" jest tests/security/penetration-tests.test.js
